## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ceacaddd98b873d32e3e6aa49bd9d48f964eca12ffe724a93abeee1ca81004db)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@gintel/personal-assistant' @ 0.180.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
